Side Effects: They were minimal. Foggy head_ occasional nausea and mild itch. Some people experience rash and severe itch.
Comments: Used along side Interferon and Telaprevir_ this drug is part of the cocktail cure for Hepatitis C. I have responded very well using this medication and have cleared the virus. It's pretty well the only treatment_ so you have no real say in it.In Canada it comes as copegasys. An injection of Peginterferon-Alpha-2a and a bottle of ribavarin. The interferon injection produces flu-like symptoms for up to_ but not always 3 days.
